meanings.sent1: The tungstic properties of the metal make it very durable.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the tungstic characteristics of the new alloy.
meanings.sent3: The tungstic coating on the spaceship made it look like a shiny star.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong and unyielding as tungstic steel.
meanings.sent5: The tungstic glow of the lamp illuminated the room with a cool, blue light.

meanings.sent1: The tungstic rock had a unique shine to it.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry was made of a rare, tungstic material.
meanings.sent3: The tungstic paint on the car made it stand out in the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a deep, tungstic resonance that captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The tungstic color of the sky during sunset was breathtakingly beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The tungstic compound was used in the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The tungstic content in the ore was analyzed by the geologist.
meanings.sent3: The tungstic smell in the air indicated the presence of the mineral nearby.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a tungstic brilliance under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The tungstic taste of the water hinted at its purity and mineral content.
